description: Easy, cheesy, totally dairy-free cashew queso! This luscious vegan cheese is loaded with flavor and easy to make, with just 7 ingredients.
keywords: easy vegan cheese, vegan appetizer recipe
name: Cashew Queso
recipeIngredient: 1 cup raw cashews, (soaked in water 4-8 hours, rinsed, and drained)
2 tablespoons vinegar-based hot sauce, (plus more to taste (I use 4 tablespoons of Cholula)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the cashews, nutritional yeast, hot sauce, onion powder, garlic powder, and 1/4 cup of water into the bowl of a food processor fitted with an s-blade.
Blend until smooth, stopping to scrape down the sides of the bowl as needed.
Thin with anywhere between 1/4 and 3/4 cup of water, depending on desired thickness (I used about 1/2 cup in the batch shown in the photos). Blend again until smooth.
Season the queso with salt to taste, and adjust any other seasonings to your liking.
